meanings.definition: A particle smaller than an atom.
meanings.sent1: Scientists study subatoms to understand the building blocks of matter.
meanings.sent2: The concept of subatoms revolutionized the field of physics.
meanings.sent3: When the subatoms threw a tiny party, the electrons were the first to arrive.
meanings.sent4: In the world of particles, subatoms are like hidden treasures waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent5: The microscope revealed a hidden world of subatoms dancing around.

meanings.sent1: Subatoms are the fundamental components that make up everything in the universe.
meanings.sent2: Chemists explore the properties of subatoms to unlock the secrets of matter.
meanings.sent3: The subatoms in the jar whispered secrets to each other late at night.
meanings.sent4: Subatoms are like tiny puzzle pieces that fit together to form the universe.
meanings.sent5: The teacher explained how subatoms combine to create different substances.
